fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
  *,
  CONCAT(CAST(YR AS STRING), '-', LPAD(CAST(MONTH_OF_YEAR AS STRING), 2, '0')) AS YEAR_MONTH_ORG
FROM fire_temp_table

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    IDNRK,
    YR,
    MONTH_OF_YEAR,
    BU_DT_monthname,
    WEEKID,
    WEEKLY_DEMAND,
    -- Format YEAR-MONTH as YYYY-MM
    CONCAT(
        YR, '-',
        LPAD(
            CASE BU_DT_monthname
                WHEN 'January' THEN '1'
                WHEN 'February' THEN '2'
                WHEN 'March' THEN '3'
                WHEN 'April' THEN '4'
                WHEN 'May' THEN '5'
                WHEN 'June' THEN '6'
                WHEN 'July' THEN '7'
                WHEN 'August' THEN '8'
                WHEN 'September' THEN '9'
                WHEN 'October' THEN '10'
                WHEN 'November' THEN '11'
                WHEN 'December' THEN '12'
            END, 2, '0'
        )
    ) AS YEAR_MONTH,
    
    -- Convert WEEKID to 'Week-1' style
    CASE WEEKID
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Week-1'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Week-2'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Week-3'
        WHEN 4 THEN 'Week-4'
        ELSE CONCAT('Week-', WEEKID)
    END AS WEEK_ID

FROM fire_temp_table;
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    IDNRK,
    MATERIAL_NAME,
    BASE_UNIT,
    UNIT_PRICE,
    LOT_SIZE,
    YR,
    MONTH_OF_YEAR,
    BU_DT_monthname,
    WEEKID,
    WEEKLY_DEMAND,
    YEAR_MONTH,
    (WEEKLY_DEMAND * UNIT_PRICE) AS WEEKLY_DEMAND_COST
FROM fire_temp_table;
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run
